price: „Зар сада верујеш, а пре си непокоран био и неред си ширио?!“
arabic: ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ عَصَيۡتَ قَبۡلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: āl'āna waqad ʿaṣayta qablu wakunta mina al-muf'sidīna
